full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4419329943
*   **Tender Title**: Purchase of 1 New 20-Foot Reefer Container
*   **Publication Date**: February 6, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
*   **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Solicitation Information**
-------------------------

*   **Solicitation Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: All regions of Canada
*   ** Regions of Delivery**: Halifax, Nova Scotia

**End-User Entity**
------------------

*   **End-User Entity Name**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
*   **End-User Entity Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E4, Canada

**Tender Description**
-------------------

The Royal Canadian Government seeks qualified suppliers to provide 1 new 20-foot reefer container for the storage of marine geoscience collection samples for Natural Resources Canada. The tender includes the delivery of the container, which will meet the End-User Entity’s requirements for storage and security.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

*   The offeror must provide a 20-foot reefer container that meets the technical specifications outlined in the solicitation documents.
*   The container must be delivered to the End-User Entity in Halifax, Nova Scotia.
*   The supplier must provide all necessary documentation and certifications to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   **Contracting Authority**: Shawn Trahan (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email Address**: [shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Notice Reference Number: WS4419329943

You can access the solicitation documents through the on-line procurement portal. To submit your proposal, please follow the instructions provided in the solicitation documents.
